DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine : - If difference amount LY3337641 blood/body take different formulation . A total 3 different formulation LY3337641 test . - How high-fat meal affect amount LY3337641 blood/body . - How safe well tolerate LY3337641 . The study four period . Individuals participate four period . Each period include 4 overnight stay ( 5 day ) Clinical Research Unit ( CRU ) . This study expect last 8 week . This include initial screen period , study dose period , follow period .
DOC.criteria: Are overtly healthy male female , determine medical history physical examination Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 32 kilogram per meter square ( kg/mÂ² ) inclusive Have clinical laboratory test result within normal reference range population investigative site Are able willing give sign inform consent Have participate , within last 30 day , clinical trial involve investigational product . If previous investigational product long halflife , 3 month 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) pass Have significant history current cardiovascular , dermatological ( eczema , psoriasis , acne ) , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal ( cholecystectomy acceptable ) , endocrine , hematological , neurological disorder capable significantly alter absorption , metabolism , elimination drug ; constitute risk take investigational product ; interfere interpretation data Have use intend use overthecounter prescription medication , include herbal medication , within 14 day prior plan dosing In opinion investigator sponsor , unsuitable inclusion study
